Title: Let's Val Kilmer This Car
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Matt Edsall, Hans Rodionoff, Adam Olsen, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (executive story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: When Lainey moves back to town, Barry asks her to the prom; Erica tells Murray she has made a final decision about her future in college.
